pages.text: $(bgreen)SunFlower$() can't resist bouncing to the beat, that's the life-giving jazzy rhythm of the Earth itself.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)50$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Very Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)producer$() plant that generate $(byellow)sun$() every 25 seconds. It will $(bred)slow down four times at night or when it rains.$()
$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() It will instantly produce large amount of sun.
